title: Detached house for sale in Urbanización Parque Elviria
description:
Elviria: Captivating villa in sought-after neighbourhood Located in the serene and sought-after neighbourhood of Elviria, Marbella, in Andalusia, this captivating villa offers an ideal blend of privacy and convenience. Nestled in a tranquil residential area, this property presents an incredible opportunity to own a stunning residence in one of Andalusia's most desirable locations.
With three comfortable bedrooms and spacious living areas, this villa provides ample room for comfortable living. The separate independent apartment adds versatility, whether it's for accommodating guests or utilizing it as a home office. The property also features a large garage, ensuring secure parking for vehicles and providing additional storage space.
A standout feature of this villa is the traditional bodega, offering a charming space for indulging in wine tasting or creating a cosy cellar atmosphere for entertaining friends and family. The master bedroom's terrace offers a breath-taking view of the sea, providing a serene backdrop for relaxation.
Surrounded by a beautifully maintained private garden, the villa is complemented by a refreshing swimming pool, adding the perfect touch to this dreamy residence.
Whether you're seeking a tranquil retreat or a luxurious family home, this residence embodies the essence of coastal living. With its comfort, elegance, and relaxation, this villa in Elviria, Marbella invites you to experience the true essence of coastal living in Andalusia. Elviria, a highly sought-after residential community, is situated in the eastern part of Marbella. Its prime location places it just a 15-minute drive away from Marbella city centre and a convenient 25-minute drive from the international airport of Malaga. Within Elviria, residents have access to some of the finest international schools, including the English International College, the Deutsche Schule, and Colegio Ecos.
The community of Elviria is known for its comprehensive range of amenities, ensuring a comfortable and fulfilling lifestyle for its residents. There is a wide selection of services, restaurants, supermarkets, and entertainment facilities available in the area. Additionally, golf enthusiasts will appreciate the proximity of Santa María and Santa Clara golf courses, which feature their respective clubs. For those seeking even more golfing options, Golf Club Marbella and Golf Rio Real are just a short drive away.
One of the key attractions of Elviria is its stunning sandy beaches, which exude a certain charm and offer a relaxing environment for beachgoers. Along these shores, you can find delightful beach restaurants where you can savor the local cuisine. Notably, the renowned beach club Nikki Beach is located adjacent to the luxurious five-star Hotel Don Carlos, adding an extra touch of glamour to the area.
In summary, Elviria presents an appealing residential option with its ideal location, top-notch educational institutions, abundance of services, and proximity to golf courses and breath-taking beaches.

Basic features: Parking space included in the price

title: Detached house for sale in Real de Zaragoza
description: Villa built at the end of 2021 and located only a short walk from the sea. It consists, on the ground floor, of: entrance hall; guest toilet; living room with sliding windows that slide and hide completely inside the wall; large kitchen with a centre island; dining room with access to the terrace; pantry and laundry room; exit to barbecue area and the garden. First floor: four en-suite bedrooms, two of them with access to a shared terrace; master bedroom with a large terrace. Basement: garage for about 4 cars; storage room; heated indoor pool with area to install sauna and Turkish bath; ideal room for a gym or an additional en-suite bedroom. Outside, saltwater infinity pool and garden both front and back. Ideal to live all year round or as an investment for short-term rentals. It also has solar panels, underfloor heating and air conditioning. Lift pre-installation.

Basic features: Parking space included in the price

title: Terraced house for sale in Nagüeles
description: Beautifully renovated beachside townhouse with superb sea views in one of the most privileged locations on the Golden Mile. Situated in Coral Beach, one of the most sought after complexes with beautiful gardens and pools. Just a few metres from the beach with its own private garden, this townhouse has been completely renovated to high standards. It is the second house from the beach and it is distributed over 3 levels and south-west facing, enjoying the afternoon sun, it has lots of natural light and wonderful sea views. The entrance level has a very comfortable living and dining area with a fireplace opening on to the partly private garden and communal ground, modern designer kitchen and a guest toilet. On the first level there are 3 bedrooms, one of which is en-suite and the other two share a bathroom. Terrace overlooking the sea and communal gardens. The entire upper level is occupied by the master suite with a stunning make up / desk with sea views steam fireplace, en-suite bathroom with a steam sauna, and terrace with incredible sea views. The house is exquisitely decorated and offered fully furnished. Features include: smart home system and under-floor heating by water, porcelain floors and airzone air-conditioning. A unique property that rarely comes to the market. Walking distance to Puente Romano and Puerto Banús.

Basic features: Parking space included in the price

title: Terraced house for sale in Urbanizacion Hibiscos
description: Renovation gem with Andalusian elegance in prestigious location We are excited to introduce you to this charming semi-detached villa nestled in a quiet cul de sac, offering loads of privacy. This Andalusian-style gem is a rare find, located within an esteemed gated community of the Golden Mile in Marbella. This villa presents an exciting renovation opportunity, allowing you to bring your creative vision to life and craft a personalised haven that reflects your style. Upon entry, a spacious living and dining area, complete with a charming fireplace, welcomes you with a cosy ambiance. Enter the tranquil outdoor space featuring a generous pool and a spacious covered terrace with a bar, perfect for relaxation. On the ground floor you also find a separate kitchen, conveniently connected to the rear patio and an office which could be used as a fourth bedroom as well as a separate bathroom. The upper floor comprises a generously sized master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom. From there you access a delightful terrace with open green views and a hint of sea views. The presence of a Jacuzzi bathtub adds to the appeal. Two additional bedrooms share a bathroom, accommodating family and guests. Additionally, there is a separate garage for one car. This semi-detached villa feels like a detached villa and is a testament to refined living in Marbella's prestigious Golden Mile. Its blend of privacy, charm, and scenic beauty makes a perfect foundation to create your own unique living experience. For more details or to schedule a viewing, please reach out to us. Explore the potential of this Marbella gem today. Marbella Hill Club is one of the most established and sought after communities in Marbella, situated on the hillside bellow the Sierra Blanca hills and within a few minutes’ drive to Marbella centre and the beach. Marbella Hill Club was developed by the founder of ‘families of Marbella’; the area was selected for their private residences due to the proximity to Marbella’s centre and the tranquillity of the area, surrounded by green, peaceful nature. In general, the properties in Marbella Hill Club offer fantastic views to the coastline as well as breathtaking mountain views. Villas in the area enjoy high demand; however, properties don’t come often into the market. You can find apartments in the popular ‘Jardines Colgantes’ an apartment complex with large apartments, each with its own swimming pool and very spacious terraces with spectacular views. In recent years a few new developments have been built in the area such as Montebello, a gated community of high-quality apartments and Marbella Hill Village, which offer a selection of attractive townhouses.

title: Detached house for sale in calle Real, 2
description:
Villa Nusa is a balinese inspired villa, designed to provide a tranquil setting. The use of organic materials, including stone, natural wood, adds to the warm and welcoming atmosphere of the villa, creating cozy resort-like feeling, where you can truly feel at home.
The tropical gardens feature peaceful areas, allowing you to unwind and enjoy the outdoor features of your home. With walking distance to the beach, amenities and the iconic Puerto Banús, Villa Nusa is a great holiday home as well as an attractive rental investment giving high ROI% per year.
